item.title: Lombok to Flores - 4 days and 3 nights on a Boat
item.description: The Komodo boat tour was the most amazing experience that I had during my holiday in Indonesia. We booked the 4 days and 3 nights Komodo boat tour with Wanua Adventure.

item.title: LICENSING MY PHOTOS
item.description: Everything You Need To Know Here is everything you need to know if you are interested in using my free travel photos for your own project or businesses.

item.title: Two Weeks in Indonesia
item.description: Currency In Indonesia: IDR (1 AUD = 10,000 IDR Approx, at the time of this trip) Budget for 2 Weeks for 2 Persons: 2 Million IDR (Excluding flights) Average Basic Expenses per day:
